Plan a menu that includes a variety of dishes to cater to everyone's taste preferences and dietary restrictions. For example, include vegetarian and gluten-free options.
Create a seating plan to ensure that everyone has enough space and can easily access the food and drinks.
Set up a buffet or self-service station to make it easier for guests to serve themselves and avoid long lines.
Decorate the table with festive centerpieces and candles to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
Play background music that complements the theme of the holiday dinner and sets the mood for the occasion.
